title: Viewport Unit Converter (px ⇄ vw ⇄ vh)
subtitle: Easily convert between pixels (px), viewport width (vw), and viewport height (vh). You can also enter your own screen width and height — or auto-detect your current browser viewport.

usage.title: Dynamic spacing:
usage.description: vw/vh can help scale paddings and margins on different screen sizes.

funFacts.title: CSS Introduction
funFacts.description: Viewport units were introduced in CSS3 to make layouts more flexible and responsive.

funFacts.title: vmin & vmax
funFacts.description: In addition to vw and vh, CSS also supports vmin and vmax based on the smaller/larger viewport dimension.

funFacts.title: Real-time scaling
funFacts.description: Viewport units automatically adjust when users resize the browser window.
